name: Key Colors
description:
Description:

Key Colors is an infinite runner game with a twist. You have to both avoid the oncoming obstacles and change your color to ensure you pass though the keyholes. 

Info:

This game was made over the corse of 2 weeks for the My First Game Jam.

 All the art, code, and sound effects were made by me during this jam.

Tools Used:

Aseprite

Bfxr

Godot
